details.arabic_diacless: رب اني اعوذ بك ان اســٔلك ما لـيس لى بهٖ علم‌ؕ والا تغفر لى وترحمني اكن من الخٰسرين
details.arabic: رَبِّ اِنِّيْٓ اَعُوۡذُ بِكَ اَنۡ اَسۡــَٔلَكَ مَا لَـيۡسَ لِىۡ بِهٖ عِلۡمٌ‌ؕ وَاِلَّا تَغۡفِرۡ لِىۡ وَتَرۡحَمۡنِيْٓ اَكُنۡ مِّنَ الۡخٰسِرِيۡنَ
details.transliteration: Rabbi innee aoothu bika an as alaka ma laysa lee bihi ilmun wa illa taghfir lee wa tarhamnee akun minal khasireen
details.translations: My Lord, I seek refuge in You from asking that of which I have no knowledge. And unless You forgive me and have mercy upon me, I will be among the losers.
